thread.section_title: Ticketbis opiniones | Opiniones de clientes sobre Ticketbis | ticketbis.net
thread.title: ire9ne

author: ire9ne
title: ire9ne
text: I've read all these reviews after I had already put my tickets on sale on there so I got a bit anxious after. Few days ago I received my payment through paypal on the exact day they said I would receive it (about 2 weeks after the event, you can actually check the payment day on your account). I understand why they're many bad reviews as many people try to scam by selling fake or wrong tickets but there's nothing ticketbis can do to prevent this. All they can do is give the money back. As a genuine seller with real and correct tickets everything went smoothly with me!
